name: The Maze Castle - Lost in the day
name_original: The Maze Castle - Lost in the day
description:
Escape the castle! Collect the necessary keys lost in the maze to escape. Remember that you will never have the same maze with every play!

Controls:

WASD: Move the player;

SHIFT: Run more fast;

CLICK: Click to interact with objects;

R: Run a new maze;

ESC: Quit from game;
